entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:29 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -31.5°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 62 %

Dewpoint: -36.4°C

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 48 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
